--- title: Action Recognition keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Implementation of various architectures to solve the UCF 101 actions dataset" description: "Implementation of various architectures to solve the UCF 101 actions dataset" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

This repo implementation is using fastai2 library. It is based on the implementations found on Action Recognition.

Install

First install fastai2:

$ pip install fastcore fastai2

then clone the repo, and inside the repo's folder do:

$ pip install -e .

Results

  • train baseline: Implements a Basic Resnet 34 encoder coupled with a simple attention layer over the frames. (91.7% accuracy)
  • train convlstm: resnet34 encoder + LSTM layer over image features. (94.8% accuracy)
  • train_transformer: Added a Transformer based model, inspired from DETR. This is in early stages, only supporting batch size equal to 1.

This package also provides function to download nad process the video dataset into multiple frames, check utils notebooks.

I am actually at home doing everythin on a small laptop with a GTX 1050 mobile GPU, so I am very limited to do proper benchmark. Actually I have acces to compute, so I re run the notebooks.
